| icon              = poe2 great_sword_karaboru icon.png
| description       = This weapon is named for the Huana warlord who carried it into battle. Fond as she was of leading the vanguard and surrounding herself with overconfident foes, nothing delighted Karabörü more than swinging her blade in a wide arc and cutting down an entire row of enemies. She purposely omitted a guard on the hilt, claiming that such "ornaments" threw off her balance, but later regretted her decision when a well-timed parry cost Karabörü three fingers from her fighting hand. She would go on to hone her skills on other weapons, setting aside her blade as a lesson learned.
